name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add google search option to duckduckgo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hate when you can't find what you're looking for on DuckDuckGo? Why not look at Google with a simple press of the button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hate when your using different search engines and you want to check a different one like google for different results? Well I added a button under the search bar that will do just this! It will open a new window with search what you were looking for into google!

Search Engines currently supported:
DuckDuckGo
Microsoft Bing
